_header: Worlds bliss ne last no throwe
_description: On the Vanity of this World — seven l0-line stanzas

BodDig86.First Lines:
Uuorldes blisse ne last non þroweHit wint and went awei
                    anon…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
And to heuene blisse þe ledeÞat euer last and ne
                    faileþ noneAmen . Amen . Amen . Amen . Amen .

BodRawG18.First Lines:
Worldes blis ne last no þrowe hit wit ant wend a wey a
                    non…
BodRawG18.Last Lines:
…And to heuene blisse lede Þat euere lest and failes nout
                    Amen
